title.narrative: Strengthening Media and Society in Developing Countries and Fragile States

description.narrative: This project supports media in their efforts to strengthen democratic accountability and is designed to reduce obstacles that prevent it from achieving independence or from contributing to social, economic and cultural development. Specifically, the project seeks to build internal capacities of media by strengthening digital actors, creating linkages between professionals, and empowering women media leaders while promoting gender mainstreaming in the news. It addresses systemic and sporadic threats to media freedoms by looking to strengthen legal protections and encourage solutions-based, best-practice exchanges, promoting information sharing and solidarity activities between media, and building practical action focused coalitions between media, civil society and decision-makers. Simultaneously with this project, a smaller one aiming specifically on employees in media organizations is launched with International Media Support (IMS) as partner.
